title: Deep eutectic solvent extraction of myricetin and antioxidant properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18126-18135
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01438C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Junhai Liu, Xiaosha Guo, Qiaowei Miao, Xiaohui Ji, Yinku Liang, Tianjiao Tong
In this study, a response surface method (RSM) was used to optimise the ultrasonic-assisted deep eutectic solvent (DES) extraction of myricetin from myricetin leaves.
